code: export var EQUIPMENT_LIST=[{id:"1",title:"Jump Rope",description:"a rope!",url:"./assets/rope.jpg"},{id:"2",title:"Power Ball",description:"a ball!",url:"./assets/ball.jpg"},{id:"3",title:"Dumbbells",description:"a dumbbell!",url:"./assets/dumbbell.jpg"},{id:"4",title:"Barbell / Plates",description:"a plate!",url:"./assets/barbell.jpg"},{id:"5",title:"Pull-Up Bar",description:"a pull bar!",url:"./assets/pull.jpg"},{id:"6",title:"Kettlebell",description:"a kettle!",url:"./assets/bell.jpg"},{id:"7",title:"Jumping Box",description:"a box!",url:"./assets/box.jpeg"},{id:"8",title:"Rings",description:"a ring!",url:"./assets/ring.webp"},{id:"9",title:"Resistance Band",description:"a band!",url:"./assets/band.jpeg"},{id:"10",title:"Sandbag",description:"a bag!",url:"./assets/bag.png"},{id:"11",title:"None",description:"a body!",url:"./assets/body.png"}];export var MUSCLE_LIST=[{id:"1",title:"Back"},{id:"2",title:"Legs"},{id:"3",title:"Shoulder"},{id:"4",title:"Arms"},{id:"5",title:"Full-Body"},{id:"6",title:"Abs"}];var generateMinutes=function generateMinutes(){var minutes=[];for(var i=0;i<11;i++){minutes.push({value:i*60000,text:i,key:i});};return minutes;};var generateSeconds=function generateSeconds(){var seconds=[];for(var i=0;i<60;i=i+5){seconds.push({value:i*1000,text:i,key:i});};return seconds;};export var MINUTES=generateMinutes();export var SECONDS=generateSeconds();
